name: Pangoro
flavorText:
Although it possesses a violent temperament,
it won’t put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in
its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.

previous.name: Pancham
previous.flavorText:
It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies,
but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating.
Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.

next.name: Furfrou
next.flavorText:
Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes
it more elegant but also increases the
swiftness of its movements.
next.formDescription: Forms only differ in appearance.  Furfrou's trim can be changed at any time in Friseur Furfrou in Lumiose City.  It reverts to its Natural Form after five days unless trimmed again, or if it is deposited in the PC.
